text: Claibornesville is a ghost town in Yazoo County, Mississippi, United States. Claibornesville had a post office as early as 1846. A comical short-story set in Claibornesville, entitled Mike Hooter's Fight With The Panther: A Yazoo Sketch, was published in The Sydney Morning Herald in 1854. ==References== Category:Former populated places in Yazoo County, Mississippi Category:Former populated places in Mississippi
title: Claibornesville, Mississippi
